page.title: 17RECREATION OUTSIDE
page.content: FISHING IS WITHIN THIS 12 KM.SQUARE THE MOST POPULAR OUTDOOR ACTIVITY AND ALL OF THE RIVER OUSE IS LEASED TO ANGLING CLUBS:NEWPORT PAGNELL,GAYHURST,LEIGHTON BUZZARD AND TESCO.NEWPORT PAGNELL CLUB IS RUN FROM A SHOP IN NEWPORT ITSELF WHERE DAY PERMITS CAN BE OBTAINED OR A YEARS MEMBERSHIP.THERE IS AN ELECTED COMITTEE,TREASURER etc. AND VOLUNTARY BAILIFFS REGULATE USE OF THE RIVER AND ORGANISE MATCHES.(See ECOLOGY II) LOCAL PEOPLE WALK A GREAT DEAL,OFTEN WITH THEIR DOGS BUT FOR SPORT THEY GO OUT OF THE VILLAGES e.g.CRICKET AT SHERINGTON,SWIMMING AT MIDDLETON POOL, NEWPORT PAGNELL OR STANTONBURY LEISURE CENTRE.A FEW GO HORSE RIDING BUT THIS IS MAINLY OUTSIDERS OR THE ACTUAL OWNERS.SPORTS FACILITIES AT TYRINGHAM CLINIC ARE ONLY OPEN TO PATIENTS.A PLAYING FIELD BESIDE THE OLD SCHOOL IS LITTLE USED AND POORLY KEPT.
